step.cmd: Go to the Garden menu, and then tap the To-dos tab.
To add a new item, tap +.
Enter a Name for your to-do item.
Optional: Specify time management settings for the to-do item:

substep.cmd: To set a Reminder to start focusing on an item, select the time and the days when you would like to receive notifications.
Set a Goal for completing the to-do item.
substep.stepxmp: If you aim to complete this to-do item in 3 hours, select 3 h.

substep.cmd: Decide if you want to reset the goal on a Daily, Weekly, or Monthly basis.
substep.stepxmp: If you want to set aside 3 hours every day for this to-do item, select Daily.

substep.cmd: To track your habits, set Habit Tracker to Weekly or Monthly.
